title: x/mobile/gobind: task fails on CentOS
body:
We have a Jenkins running on VM with CentOS:
`CentOS release 6.4 (Final) 
Kernel 2.6.32-358.14.1.el6.x86_64 on an x86_64`

I tried to install Go mobile from Jenkins job and from command prompt as root user few times.
No errors, warnings, etc. $GOPATH/pkg folder looks like contains everything initialized.

But gobind task always fails with the error:
_toolchain partially installed, run \`gomobile init\`_

run `gomobile init` once more doesn't help.

Go 1.5
